headline: Dot's Homestyle Pretzels Spices Up Game Day Snacking with New Buffalo Flavored Seasoned Twists
summary: Let's be real—for many football fans, the snacks are just as important (if not more!) than the game itself. That's why when Dot's Homestyle Pretzels heard the crowd go wild on social media for the possibility of a Buffalo flavor, we knew we had to complete the pass. Introducing Dot's Homestyle Pretzels Buffalo Flavored Seasoned Twists— a spicy and tangy snack that brings bold Buffalo heat and our signature buttery crunch in every bite, giving you a new way to enjoy Dot's Homestyle Pretzels.

thumbnail.caption: New Dot’s Homestyle Pretzels Buffalo Flavored Seasoned Twists, available now at retailers nationwide.
